name: GREATWORLD
description:
OUR GAME :

Create an ecological or petroleum environment in a 2048 style gameplay. Evolve your buildings in the right direction to win the missions! What World will you want to build?

GREATWORLD is a mobile game made in 5 days for a Game Jam with the theme "Make a better world".  This project was made by a team of 8 students !

There are 4 levels to challenge, good luck !

CREDITS :

Enjoy it ♥

Made with Unity & Visual Studio. Assets with Maya & Photoshop. UI with Illustrator.
